title: Jasper Philipsen: Rising supersprinter and world title threat under fire for Tour de France blocking
content:
Belgium's green jersey-in-waiting poses 'luxury' dilemma for Belgian worlds team after selection alongside Van Aert, Evenepoel.

Read the full article at Jasper Philipsen: Rising supersprinter and world title threat under fire for Tour de France blocking on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
